titles.title: Lord you are so precious to me
Je t'aime

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord You are so precious to me
Lord You are so precious to me
(2x) And I love You, Yes I love You
Because You first loved me. (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, You are so gracious to me;
Lord, You are so gracious to me.
And I love You, yes I love You,
because You first loved me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Seigneur tu est si precious pour moi
Seigneur tu est si precious pour moi
(2x) Et je t'aime, oui je t'aime
Car tu m'a tant aim√© (2x)
